item.title: 克罗地亚管道公司寻求新的销售，因为美国的限制措施打击了重要客户
item.description: 克罗地亚国有石油管道运营商 Janaf d.d. 公司管理委员会成员 Vladislav Veselica 表示，由于其最大客户目前正受到美国制裁，该公司正寻求通过新客户和可再生能源实现业务多元化。【原文：Croatian state-owned oil pipeline operator Janaf d.d. is seeking to diversify its business with new clients and renewable energy as its biggest customer is now under US sanctions, according to Vladislav Veselica, a management board member at the company.】

item.description:
争议拖得越久，船主和他们所服务的消费者就越有可能遭受损失。【原文：

item.title: 港口反击特朗普对货运设备征收关税
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和习近平将贸易战扩大到公海，港口运营商正在对华盛顿的措施进行反击，称以中国为重点的惩罚措施最终可能会给美国造成更大的伤害。【原文：As Donald Trump and Xi Jinping expand their trade war to the high seas, port operators are pushing back on Washington’s measures, saying that China-focused penalties could ultimately hurt America more than it should.】

item.title: 中国的稀土行动为财务总监会议蒙上阴影
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注的是，在财政官员齐聚华盛顿之际，人们对中国稀土产业发展的忧虑。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 南非顶级农场游说团体寻求解决农村道路 "危机
item.description: 南非最大的农业游说团体表示，南非的农村道路正处于 "危机 "状态，该团体正与政府组织合作改善道路状况，以保证农产品的运输。【原文：South Africa’s biggest farming lobby said the nation’s rural roads are in a state of “crisis” and is working with government organizations to improve them and keep agricultural goods moving.】

item.title: 调查显示，私人信贷将从竞争对手手中赢得更多交易
item.description: 彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）周三发布的《2025 年秋季私人信贷调查》显示，随着私人市场与公共市场之间联系的加强，私人贷款机构可能取代 15%的传统固定收益投资。【原文：Private lenders could replace 15% of traditional fixed-income investment, according to Bloomberg Intelligence’s Fall 2025 private credit survey published Wednesday, as links between private and public markets strengthen.】

item.title: 西班牙高管力促桑切斯支持针对中国技术的新限制措施
item.description: 西班牙高管要求政府支持欧盟计划，该计划将迫使中国公司在欧盟内部运营时交出关键技术机密。【原文：Spanish executives are asking their government to back European Union plans that would force Chinese companies to hand over key technological secrets when operating inside the bloc.】

item.title: 银行首席执行官们在数据停摆之际发出曙光
item.description:
华尔街主管暗示信贷压力和经济降温。【原文：

Wall Street chiefs have hinted at credit stress and a cooling economy. 

】

item.title: 土耳其 5G 拍卖将推动数十亿美元的运营商支出
item.description: 土耳其将于本周四举行首次 5G 频谱拍卖，交易价值至少 21.3 亿美元，预计将启动该国移动运营商新一轮的网络支出。【原文：Turkey will hold its first 5G spectrum auction on Thursday, in a deal worth at least $2.13 billion that’s expected to launch a new round of network spending by the country’s mobile operators.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰首席执行官称从银行贷款中寻找戴蒙的蟑螂
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Banks might want to look at their own books for any “cockroaches,” Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s co-chief executive officer, Marc Lipschultz, said on Tuesday, standing in fierce defense of private credit.】

item.title: 受利率和贸易忧虑影响，美国两年期收益率接近 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 由于预期美国利率将继续下降，以及中美之间新的贸易紧张局势刺激了对更安全资产的需求，国债走高。【原文：Treasuries edged higher on expectations US interest rates will keep falling and as fresh trade tension between the US and China spurred demand for safer assets.】

item.title: 葡萄牙社会党投弃权票，初步预算案将获通过
item.description: 葡萄牙社会党表示，该党将在本月就 2026 年预算案进行的首次投票中投弃权票，这增加了少数派中右翼政府推动其财政计划获得议会通过的机会。【原文：Portugal’s Socialist Party said it will abstain in this month’s initial vote on the 2026 budget, boosting the chances for the minority center-right government to push its fiscal plan through parliament.】

item.title: 摩根大通成为最新一家获得沙特总部许可的华尔街银行
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has secured a regional headquarters license in Saudi Arabia, allowing the US lender to expand its on-the-ground operations in the kingdom as authorities push multinationals to set up bigger bases in Riyadh.】

item.title: 法国财政争端持续发酵，法国债券前景充满风险
item.description: 法国的政治僵局取得突破后，法国债券市场的欣慰将是短暂的，因为策略师们指出，法国政府未来仍将面临巨大的财政挑战。【原文：The French bond market’s relief in the wake of a breakthrough in the country’s political deadlock is set to be short-lived as strategists point to the enormous fiscal challenges that still lie ahead for the government.】

item.title: 迪纳波利称纽约市公交系统面临 4.32 亿美元预算缺口
item.description: 根据纽约州主计长托马斯-迪纳波利（Thomas DiNapoli）的报告，纽约市公交系统今年可能面临 4.32 亿美元的预算缺口，因为地铁、公共汽车和通勤铁路运营商可能需要等到 2026 年才能从联邦资金中获得科维德大流行期间清洁费用的补偿。【原文：New York City’s transit system faces a potential $432 million budget shortfall this year because the subway, bus and commuter rail operator may need to wait until 2026 to get reimbursed from federal money owed for cleaning costs during the Covid pandemic, according to a report from Thomas DiNapoli, the state’s comptroller.】

item.title: 私人通胀数据显示部分商品因关税而变得更加昂贵
item.description: 私营部门的数据显示，9 月份美国通胀率有所回升，这进一步证明，在没有政府官方指标的情况下，关税推动了某些价格的上涨。【原文：Private-sector measures suggest US inflation picked up in September, offering more evidence of tariffs boosting certain prices in the absence of official government metrics.】

item.title: 核新创公司将在德克萨斯 A&M 校园部署试验性微反应器
item.description: 随着人工智能对能源需求的不断增长，小型模块化反应堆的竞争也日趋白热化。【原文：Last Energy Inc., an Austin-based nuclear startup, plans to test its pilot microreactor on a campus of Texas A&M University as the race for small modular reactors heats up amid growing energy demand for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Inpex 称印尼寻求加速阿巴迪液化天然气项目
item.description: 随着国内和整个地区能源需求的增长，印尼 Inpex 公司负责人表示，印尼正在寻求加快阿巴迪液化天然气项目。【原文：Indonesia is looking to speed up the Abadi liquefied natural gas project, with energy demand rising domestically and across the region, according to the head of Inpex Corp.】

item.title: 肯尼亚正与英国央行洽谈存储其寻求购买的黄金事宜
item.description: 肯尼亚东非国家央行行长表示，肯尼亚计划购买黄金以实现储备多样化，并已与英格兰银行就包括金银储存在内的议题进行了会谈。【原文：Kenya plans to buy gold to diversify its reserves and has held talks with the Bank of England on topics including bullion storage, the East African nation’s central bank governor said.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后首个完整月印度贸易逆差扩大
item.description: 印度 9 月份的贸易逆差有所扩大，这是美国对印度商品征收亚洲最高关税以来的首个全月数据。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened in September, the first full month of data since the US imposed its highest tariffs in Asia on Indian goods.】

item.title: 中国港口收费抬高油轮成本引发市场混乱
item.description: 中国的报复性港口征税使石油运输公司面临高昂的费用，使他们不得不争相办理相关手续，并导致延误、取消和运费飙升。【原文：China’s retaliatory port levies are exposing oil shipping companies to hefty fees, making them scramble for relevant paperwork, and contributing to delays, cancellations and spiraling freight costs.】

item.title: 波动率上升，VIX 曲线反转考验交易员的决心
item.description: 周五，新一轮贸易战的姿态令股市多头踉踉跄跄，但本周迄今为止，随着 S&P 500 指数收复了周尾一半的跌幅，多头的情绪得到了缓解。不过，熊市还没有完全屈服。【原文：Equity bulls, staggered Friday by fresh trade-war posturing, have so far gotten relief this week as the S&P 500 Index recouped half of its late-week losses. Bears, though, haven’t quite capitulated.】

item.title: 小米司机之死为中国电动车车门设计推波助澜
item.description: 一起涉及小米公司 SU7 电动轿车的死亡事故再次引起了人们对平齐式车门把手的关注，并可能加强中国对更严格安全标准的推动。SU7电动轿车的死亡事故再次引起了人们对平开门把手的关注，这很可能会加强中国对更严格安全标准的推动。【原文：A fatality involving a Xiaomi Corp. SU7 electric sedan has renewed scrutiny of flush car door handles and is likely to reinforce China’s push for tougher safety standards.】

item.title: 华为附属公司展示助推中国芯片雄心的产品
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对中国获取先进技术实施更多限制的几天前，华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s key partners are showcasing a dizzying array of products from software to chip gear just days after US President Donald Trump threatened more curbs on China’s access to advanced technologies.】

item.title: DHL 计划投资 3 亿欧元拓展非洲物流业务
item.description: DHL 集团计划在非洲投资 3 亿多欧元（3.49 亿美元）建设仓库和其他基础设施，以满足电子商务和可再生能源等行业的需求。【原文：DHL Group plans to invest more than €300 million ($349 million) in warehouses and other infrastructure in Africa to capitalize on demand from sectors such as e-commerce and renewable energy.】

item.title: 首席财务官称 ASML 已为中国稀土限制做好充分准备
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席财务官罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）周三表示，尽管对更广泛的芯片生态系统的影响难以评估，但 ASML Holding NV 已为中国限制稀土出口做好了 "充分准备"。【原文：ASML Holding NV is “well prepared” for China’s curbs on exports of rare earths even as the impact on the wider chips ecosystem is difficult to assess, Chief Financial Officer Roger Dassen said Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车旗下斯堪尼亚在中国开设价值 20 亿欧元的卡车工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）卡车品牌斯堪尼亚（Scania AB）在中国建立了一个价值 20 亿欧元（23 亿美元）的制造工厂，为全球最大的卡车市场供应卡车，并向亚洲出口。【原文：Volkswagen AG truck brand Scania AB has opened a €2 billion ($2.3 billion) manufacturing facility in China to supply trucks in the world’s biggest market as well as export to Asia.】

item.title: 贝利发表就业讲话后，英国债券跳涨，创四月以来最佳表现
item.description: 在英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）指出就业市场疲软后，英国债券跳涨，投资者押注英国央行将进一步降息。【原文：UK bonds jumped and investors bet on more Bank of England interest-rate reductions after Governor Andrew Bailey flagged a weaker jobs markets.】

item.title: 印度央行认为卢比受到投机攻击，将进一步干预
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，印度央行认为卢比最近的疲软是投机性攻击造成的，并准备继续进行市场干预，直到卢比稳定在一个较强的水平。【原文：India’s central bank considers recent weakness in the rupee as driven by speculative attacks and is prepared to continue its market intervention until the currency settles at a stronger level, a person familiar with the matter said.】
